pros: Very flexible with hours and time off when needed.

pros: Nice environment and hardworking people

pros: Easy job for adjunct instruction

pros: Supportive staff and great programs provided

job_title: Adjunct Faculty in Santa Ana, CA
pros: Talented and inspirational colleagues & students

job_title: Project Coordinator II in Irvine, CA

job_title: Proctor in Santa Ana, CA
pros: The hours of work are flexible if scheduling is well managed. Department has a number of very capable and widely experienced employees. Opportunities to work with various computer applications
cons: There is minimal room for job growth. Little communication is had between employees and director. Job security is based on senority and budget issues may cause issues in job security.

job_title: Instructional Assistant in Orange, CA
pros:
-Friendly Coworkers
-Great Environment
-Kind Students
-Very Flexible with schedules
cons:
-Difficult to get Full time employment
In the 3 years I have worked here, I have applied to 2 different full-time positions. Unfortunately, I could not get either one.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Irvine, CA
pros: Supportive administrators, supervisors, and colleagues.  Flex Week offers professional interactions and informative workshops for both new and long-time faculty.
cons: No health insurance for adjunct faculty.  Also job security depends on active enrollment that is beyond the instructor's control.

job_title: Account Clerk in Santa Ana, CA
pros: Good medical package, Stable job, calm work environment, opportunity to apply for various positions throughout school district.
cons: Union , so hard to get paid more money. Strict and very formal work environment.

job_title: Adjunct Instructor in Orange, CA
pros: Enjoyable place to work. Instructors, administrators, and staff are professional and friendly. Adult students appreciate the free continuing education classes in business skills and workforce readiness.
cons: Hours for part-time staff are limited.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Irvine, CA
pros: I have one of the best boss in the district, people are friendly, and they compensation is okay.
cons: There is a lot of bad rumors that go on with the district.

job_title: Instructor in Orange, CA
pros: I enjoy the supportive community of working for a community college. Staff is friendly and truly care about helping students.

job_title: Adjunct Faculty in Santa Ana, CA
pros: Opportunity for growth, strong support from my Dean and Department Chairs

job_title: Test Proctor in Santa Ana, CA
